item.title: squid game and 2020
item.description:
basically there is this new trend on tt where people are acting like its 2020, and likee bringing back the weirdcore/ glitchcore pfps and the 120fps anime edits and the like tripple screen irl animation memes and that makes me SO HAPPY!!
pleaseeeeeeeeee last more than a week :sob:
oh also i finished watching squid game s2 and it srs made me want to jump off a building, like no joke i was SUFFERINGG the only good thing that came from it is that 120 is an absolute girlboss and survived *it*
I SWEAR IF SHE DIES IN S3 THOUGH

item.title: FIRST POST!!
item.description: HAPPY NEW YEAR EVERYBODY!! i hope next year is awesome ^^
